title: Blowing Off Steam
description: His bad-boy past defines him. Could a shy trainspotter be his redemption?Sam Chancellor has been in love with the steam engine Old Bess his whole life. Trains are so much easier than people—they don’t expect conversation, and they never bully anyone. But Bess’s place in his heart has suddenly been challenged by her sexy new driver, the embodiment of all Sam’s fantasies. If only Sam knew how to talk to him.Ryan Saunders found out the hard way that all the drinking and partying in the world couldn’t fill the void inside him. After a life filled with regrets, his job as a train-driver is his last chance to prove to his father—and himself—that he’s not a complete failure.Ryan suggests hooking up with Sam, hoping a brief fling will distract him from his unhappiness. Sam seizes the opportunity—and Ryan—with both, very eager, hands. As he learns to see beneath Ryan’s arrogant smirk, he discovers a kinder, more complex man. And something keeps drawing Ryan back to Sam’s shabby terraced house.But when hidden truths are unearthed, Sam sees a side of Ryan he never imagined. And as other secrets come to light, the stakes turn deadly.Product Warnings:Contains train geekery, bed-hogging, a hero with no experience and another with plenty to spare, and a spider called Mabel.
author: Joy Lynn Fielding
